import { MoreVert, ThumbUp } from '@mui/icons-material' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Users } from '../dummyData' function Post({post}) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.like) return (
{Users.map(user => user.id===post.userId ? : null )} {Users.map(user => user.id===post.userId ? {user.username} : null )} {post.date}
{post.desc}
{post.like} people like it.
{ post.comment === 1 || post.comment === 0 ? {post.comment} comment : {post.comment} comments }
) } export default Post
